relation: There are many campus events. Students can also go down town or go to any of the awesome local restaurants.
Study, study, study! D'Youville is a wonderful school with a tough curriculum.
Amazing professors and amazing colleagues. I enjoy the small school and knowing where everything is. Everyone is so helpful.

textBeforeTable: 10/14/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 9 out of 10 people found this review useful. 1 of 26 STRANGE from Liverpool, NY Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Am learning a lot PROFESSORS ARE VERY INFORMATIVE AND HELPFUL. Login to rate or flag the reviews Erica from Amherst, NY 02/10/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 26 Categories Comments Campus Safety it is in a very dangerous neighborhood. at least one car a week gets broken into. if you chose this college make sure to park on the d'youville lots with security and cameras. Bang for the buck i recieved a 50% tuition scholarship and i am enrolled in the 5 year b.s./m.s. program so it definitely saved me a lot of money. Food and Dining i don't eat the food there, i'm a commuter so i just drive to the campus and go back home to eat. Dorm Life
